name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 51: A Christmas Conundrum

content.html:
Dear Internet, This week we bring a little more holiday with a question about what to do when your dang wife won’t stop finding her presents. We also talk about mom’s cool tinder profile, and someone who doesn’t know when to quit. Stay gold, XOXO We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
